Name: Jarl Vetreiđi
Functional Text:
Whenever you play an Ice card, create a Frostbite token in an opponent's exposed head, chest, arms, or legs zone.

**Essence of Earth and Ice**

Name: Summit, the Unforgiving
Functional Text:
**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}{r} {r}{r}{r}: **Attack**

When this hits a hero, create a Frostbite token in their exposed head, chest, arms, or legs zone.

**Heavy** - If this is the only card equipped to your weapon zones, it gets +2{p}.

Name: Ollin Ice Cap
Functional Text:
When this defends together with an Ice card, create a Frostbite token under the attacking hero's control.

**Blade Break**

Name: Tectonic Crust
Functional Text:
When this defends together with an Earth card, create a Seismic Surge token.

**Temper**

Name: Gauntlets of the Boreal Domain
Functional Text:
**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}: If an Earth card is pitched this way, your attacks named Mangle get +2{p} this turn. If an Ice card is pitched this way, your attacks named Mangle get **dominate** this turn. **Go again**

**Temper**

Name: Root-Bound Trunks
Functional Text:
When this defends together with an aura card, create an Embodiment of Earth token.

**Blade Break**

Name: Mangle
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, destroy target equipment they control with a -1{d} counter on it.

Name: Unforgetting Unforgiving
Functional Text:
**Jarl Specialization**

When this defends, if the attacking hero controls an equipment with a -1{d} counter, you may search your deck for a Mangle, banish it, then shuffle. You may play it during your next action phase.

Name: Channel Mount Isen
Functional Text:
**Go again**

At the start of each hero's turn, they lose {h} equal to the number of Frostbites in their equipment zones.

**Channel Ice** - At the beginning of your end phase, put a flow counter on this, then destroy it unless you put an Ice card from your pitch zone on the bottom of your deck for each flow counter on it.

Name: Crumble to Eternity
Functional Text:
**Jarl Specialization**

When this enters the arena, you may put a -1{d} counter on an equipment.

At the beginning of your action phase, destroy this, then your next attack this turn gets **dominate**.

Name: Frozen to Death
Functional Text:
**Ice Fusion**

If this was **fused**, you may destroy an equipment with a -1{d} counter.

You may create a Frostbite token in an exposed head, chest, arms, or legs zone.
